headline: Ex-Saints winger Lexi Lloyd-Smith signs for Bristol City Women
summary: Bristol City have signed 21-year-old winger Lexi Lloyd-Smith on a two-year deal, following her departure from Southampton. She spent two seasons with the Saints, having begun her career began in Arsenal’s Academy before spells at […]

headline: Maddi Wilde rejoins London City Lionesses on permanent deal
summary: Maddi Wilde returns to London City Lionesses on two-year contract after a loan spell last season from Bristol City. The 20-year-old full-back made a total of 25 appearances in all competitions for London City last […]

headline: Durham sign New Zealand international Hanna Blake
summary: Durham have signed 24-year-old New Zealand international forward Hannah Blake from A-League side Adelaide United. The attacker represented New Zealand at the U-20 World Cup and was also part of her nation’s training camp ahead […]

headline: Lisa Evans goes back to Glasgow City
summary: Lisa Evans returns to Glasgow City for whom the Scotland centurion previously averaged more than a goal a game. She left City to play in the Frauen Bundesliga in 2012, notching up over 80 appearances […]

headline: Hearts Women to clash with Glasgow City in Sky Sports Cup
summary: The draw for the 2024/25 Sky Sports Cup sees Montrose host Celtic in the last sixteen, while Hearts clash with Glasgow City. Joining the Scottish Women’s Premier League were Joelle Murray and Tracy Burns. Murray, […]

headline: England squad selected for UEFA Women’s U-19 Championship
summary: A 20-strong England squad has been selected to compete at the 2024 UEFA Women’s U-19 Championship in Lithuania this month. England kick off their group fixtures against the hosts on Sunday 14 July, followed by […]

headline: Former Brighton Women midfielder Tatiana Pinto joins Atlético Madrid
summary: Tatiana Pinto has signed for Atlético Madrid, after the Portuguese international spent one year at Brighton & Hove Albion. The 30-year-old, who has over 100 caps for her country, played 20 times for Brighton last […]

headline: Women’s pre-season friendly round-up for 7 July
summary: Round-up from the pre-season friendlies on Sunday 7 July 2024, where the outcome or scoreline were made public. Swansea City played three lots of 35 minutes against Bridgwater United, with the only goals coming in […]

headline: Sion Swifts go into the mid-season break as NIWFA Championship leaders
summary: Sion Swifts top the NIWFA Championship going into the mid-season break, following a fine 3-0 victory over Ballymena United with three late goals. The game looked set to end without a goal but on 87 […]

headline: Aston Villa Women’s Alisha Lehmann completes transfer to Juventus
summary: Switzerland international winger Alisha Lehmann has joined Juventus from Aston Villa on a three-year contract. Lehmann spent three seasons with Villa, totalling 74 appearances and scoring 14 goals, helping the club to its best-ever league […]
